text: "Yellow Ledbetter" is a 1992 song by alternative rock band Pearl Jam and is the B-side to their 1992 single Jeremy. It was never released as a single and it remains one of their popular songs. It was used in the series finale of the NBC sitcom Friends. ==References== Category:1992 songs Category:1990s ballads Category:Blues rock songs Category:Rock ballads Category:Pearl Jam songs
title: Yellow Ledbetter
